item.description:
One of the final shows in this 11 week series of Hitchcock classics hosted by Amherst Cinema.

Because the Sunday showings are often crowded the MeetUp is planned for afterward instead of beforehand.
Meet me after the movie outside by the back exit of the theater (the door by the actual theater auditoriums, adjacent to the town parking lot).
I'll have a MeetUp sign with me.

From there we can go over to Amherst Coffee.
If it's crowded maybe grab a cup to go and head over to sit on the Common.
I'm open to suggestions from those who plan to attend about places to go afterward.

I'll wait outside the theater after the movie to meet all who'll be joining us.
I'll email contact info before the movie so that you can be sure to find the group.

I'll close RSVPs at 10am on Sunday so please reply before then so I know who to look out for.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet me after the movie outside by the back exit of the theater (the door by the actual theater auditoriums, adjacent to the town parking lot). I'll have a MeetUp sign with me.
item.name: Vertigo--Hitchcock! @Amherst Cinema
